content.question: In lines 5-12 (“When . . . then”), the speaker describes changes that may take place in his appearance primarily in order to

choices.label: dramatize the hardships that he is about to face
outline the reasons that his journey is necessary
explain some surprising aspects of the picture
suggest that he will understand if the beloved leaves him

content.answer: dramatize the hardships that he is about to face

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
